name: WebEx Recording File
summary: Learn about .WOT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The WOT format can still be viewed with the older WebEx Player. WebEx now uses the .WRF and .ARF formats for recordings.

description: Video file created by older versions of WebEx business conferencing software; saves a recording of the conversation and displayed presentations; used for reviewing meetings.
